data.description: Converts epochs from one to another
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A simple module to accept epoch seconds and return epoch seconds
    (currently only implements converting the Mac OS epoch to the
    perl/Unix epoch, and vice versa).

    I believe DateTime::Format::Epoch could do this, but it requires a
    half-dozen other modules, and a C compiler.
